useCase.name: Check Upgrade Compatibility for Dataset Instance

preconditions.precondition: The Dataset Developer requests an upgrade check for a Dataset Instance with a new version.

mainSequence.step: The Dataset Developer requests an upgrade check for a Dataset Instance with a new version.
The Dataset Version Control retrieves dataset type information for the new version from the Dataset Registry.
The Dataset Version Control gets existing version details for the specified Dataset Instance.
The Dataset Version Control compares the dataset type details with the existing version details.
The Dataset Version Control retrieves upgrade compatibility rules for the dataset type from the Dataset Registry.
The Dataset Version Control applies compatibility rules to determine upgrade compatibility.
If the upgrade is compatible, the Dataset Version Control confirms the upgrade, upgrades the Dataset Instance, and notifies the Dataset Developer of the successful upgrade.
If the upgrade is not compatible, the Dataset Version Control notifies the Dataset Developer of the incompatibility reason.
